title: Amaram Akhilam Prema
overview: Akhila is a pampered young daddyâ€™s girl who studies engineering in Kakinada. She moves to Hyderabad to prepare for civil services. Amar is an aspiring musician who falls for her and puts all his effort into getting her attention. Why did Akhila really move to Hyderabad and what makes her fall for Amar is what the film is all about.
